channel.title: Posts on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Hugo website

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction The dataset I selected to use was the Daily Shelter Occupancy Data. I found it very interesting to find out which shelter sector’s are more or less catered for through analysing their excess capacity. I found this very interesting as I have made use of the violin geom in order to add the demension of the capacity density’s

item.title: The Capacities Of Different Homeless Shelter Sectors
item.description: Abstract This is a statistical analysis of the capacity of homeless shelters in the City of Toronto. This analysis aims to find the different capacities in homeless shelter sectors. This will alow for a better understanding of which sectors have excess capacities and which are struggling to meet the demand. Introduction Homelesness is a serious issue around the country and Toronto is not exempt from that. On any given night there are 9,200 homeless people in Toronto^1 in need of a place to stay.
